solution_line_template: Deduct the amount saved from the total cost of the set. ${makeup_set_cost} - ${already_saved} = $<<{makeup_set_cost}-{already_saved}={remaining_after_initial_save}>>{remaining_after_initial_save}
Deduct the amount of money Gabby received from her mom. ${remaining_after_initial_save} - ${mom_gift} = $<<{remaining_after_initial_save}-{mom_gift}={needed_after_mom_gift}>>{needed_after_mom_gift}
